body: In the method case, they are registered as methods on `self` via `create_method`. Since `self` is a MethodValue, attribute lookups like `self.foo` will return a method if it has been registered with `create_method`.
body_html: In the method case, they are registered as methods on self via create_method. Since self is a MethodValue, attribute lookups like self.foo will return a method if it has been registered with create_method.
